pullRequest.title: inventory-tags: add underline as display option
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added item underline as an alternative display option for inventory
tags. Item borders remain as the default display option.

Close #12165

nodes.bodyText: "OUTLINE" would be a better name for this
Import net.runelite.client.plugins.inventorytags.InventoryTagsConfig.DisplayMode instead of using inline qualifying of DisplayMode.
Instead of creating a pseudo-getter here, inject InventoryTagsConfig into the overlay and call the config getter method directly there.
